subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: An already compact field for the Arlington Million became smaller with the announcement that the front-running Sudan will miss the race with an injured tendon. “He was fine when he galloped,” the trainer Bobby Frankel said of Sudan’s workout on Thursday. “But when we scanned him, we discovered that the horse had bowed a tendon.”.
